com.dsi.ant.chip

Class AntChipDetectorBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dsi.ant.chip.AntChipDetectorBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAntChipDetector

    public abstract class AntChipDetectorBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAntChipDetector
    Extended by a hardware specific ANT chip detector implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • scanForNewChips

        public abstract AntChipBase[] scanForNewChips()
        Tell the detector to manually check for any newly added chips it may not know about, or try reconnecting to any which failed previously. This allows for systems that don't have a working hotplug detect and therefore need to poll for new devices occasionally.
        Specified by:
        scanForNewChips in interface IAntChipDetector
        Returns:
        null if returning the new chips is not supported, instead a message with id IAntChipDetectorEventReceiver.chipAdded(IAntChip) will be called for each new chip.
        zero length list if there are no new chips.
        list with the new chips.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Description copied from interface: IAntChipDetector
        Clean up this instance, it will not be used again (eg. the remote service has unbound).
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface IAntChipDetector

      • getBinder

        public final IBinder getBinder(Intent intent)
        Provides the binder reference to be returned in android.app.Service#onBind(Intent)
        Parameters:
        intent - The intent passed to onBind.
        Returns:
        The binder which the ANT Radio Service will use to communicate with the chip detector.
